page.title: 07Local News
page.content: Local news items include a former newspaper tele-ad girl, Mrs Anne Yates who has been mum to more than 20 children, only two of which are her own, the rest were fostered. The Roebuck Inn in Rishton has been voted pub of the month. They said that the pub was full to capacity at the presentation. 3/4 million Accrington bricks are to be used to build a massive new chimney at a power station in Hong Kong. The order is worth around 400,000 pounds. At the golf club in Rishton they have just won the Mayoral Golf Trophy. The team scored 133 points. The trophy was presented to the winners and the lady captain received flowers.
